title: Big Pharma, The Real Anthony Fauci, Vaccines, the CIA, the JFK Assassination, and Growing Up Kennedy (RFK JR. TALKS WITH MEGYN KELLY)
cleaned_text: Publisher’s Note: Several elements make this spring 2022 Megyn Kelly interview with The Real Anthony Fauci author and Children’s Health Defense co-founder Robert F, Kennedy Jr. – a Massachusetts-based liberal Democrat and US environmental lawyer – remarkable: open debate, civil discussion, fact checking on all sides as part of the interview, the depth and breadth of the conversation, and the refreshing nature of two bright and compassionate Humans thinking out loud together. Worth a close listen, wether you are part of the Control Group or not. Courage, Team Human! And Happy Easter. #RollAwayTheStone
